blogs.Title: Tumbling Chinese Rocket Expected To Re-Enter Atmosphere
blogs.Body: Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin is being briefed regularly about the trajectory of the Long March 5B rocket core, which successfully put a portion of China's first space station into orbit last month, Pentagon spokesman John Kirby told reporters Wednesday.
blogs.Author: Travis Tritten, Bloomberg

blogs.Title: Dhanbad Weather Forecast
blogs.Body:
Dhanbad Weather Forecast. Providing a local hourly Dhanbad weather forecast of rain, sun, wind, humidity and temperature.
The Long-range 12 day forecast also includes detail for Dhanbad weather today. Live weather reports from Dhanbad weather stations and weather warnings that include risk of thunder, high UV index and forecast gales. See the links below the 12-day Dhanbad weather forecast table for other cities and towns nearby along with weather conditions for local outdoor activities.
blogs.Author: Dhanbad (Jharkhand, India)
